Message:
She had a look of
acceptance on her face,
knowing she was going to
be abandoned anyway...

...But, that’s not
what she wants.
What she really wants lies in
words that only I could tell her.
since I bore the same wounds.

And because of that,
I also knew how
to mend them...

I knelt before her and
held out the silver coin.

“Please wait here.
I will surely come back for you.
This is the proof of my promise.”​

She hesitated,
but I placed the coin
firmly in her palm.

Her eyes sparkled like stars,
as if she was a lost child
who had finally found
her way home.

...Ah. The pain that had been
so bothersome just moments ago,
now felt almost precious.
